snippet.title: StarVaders Release Date Announcement
snippet.description:
The alien invasion begins April 30, 2025.

StarVaders is a mech-powered, grid-based roguelike deckbuilder where every move counts. Pilot customizable mechs, build devastating card combos, and defend Earth from waves of cosmic threats. Draw cards, manage heat, and outmaneuver enemies on a vertical grid in this genre-fusing tactical challenge.

Wishlist on Steam. Join the fight. Defend the future.
Wishlist StarVaders 💥 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2097570/StarVaders/
